SELECT SYSTEM_NAME AS DB_SID
,OWNER
,TABLE_NAME
, TOTAL_CNT, ACCOUNT_SUM, ADDRESS_SUM, BIO_SUM, CARD_SUM, CUSTID_SUM, DRIVER_SUM, EMAIL_SUM, PHONE_SUM, SSN_SUM, MEMO_SUM, PASSPORT_SUM, PASSWORD_SUM, VEHICLENUMBER_SUM, (TOTAL_CNT - ACCOUNT_SUM - ADDRESS_SUM - BIO_SUM - CARD_SUM - CUSTID_SUM - DRIVER_SUM - EMAIL_SUM - PHONE_SUM - SSN_SUM - MEMO_SUM - PASSPORT_SUM - PASSWORD_SUM - VEHICLENUMBER_SUM) AS ETC_SUM FROM (SELECT A.DB_SID
,A.OWNER
,A.TABLE_NAME
,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^AC', 1, 0)) AS ACCOUNT_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^AD', 1, 0)) AS ADDRESS_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^BO', 1, 0)) AS BIO_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^CD', 1, 0)) AS CARD_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^CI', 1, 0)) AS CUSTID_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^DL', 1, 0)) AS DRIVER_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^EM', 1, 0)) AS EMAIL_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^PH', 1, 0)) AS PHONE_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^SN', 1, 0)) AS SSN_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^MO', 1, 0)) AS MEMO_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^PP', 1, 0)) AS PASSPORT_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^PW', 1, 0)) AS PASSWORD_SUM, SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(A.COMMENTS, 0, 6), 'ENC^VN', 1, 0)) AS VEHICLENUMBER_SUM FROM TCKCOL A, TCKCOL_ADD B WHERE A.DB_SID = B.DB_SID AND A.OWNER = B.OWNER
AND A.DB_SID = #{dbName}
AND A.OWNER = #{owner}
AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND B.PERSONALINFO_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY A.DB_SID
, A.OWNER
, A.TABLE_NAME
) A, TCKSYS B WHERE A.DB_SID (+) = B.DB_SID ORDER BY B.SYSTEM_CODE

SELECT DB_NAME, TOT_OBJ_CNT, TOT_COL_CNT, NOT_CHECK_TAB_SUM, NOT_CHECK_SUM, PROGRESS_PERCENTAGE, TOT_PERINFO_SUM, ACCOUNT_SUM, ADDRESS_SUM, BIO_SUM, CARD_SUM, CUSTID_SUM, DRIVER_SUM, EMAIL_SUM, PHONE_SUM, SSN_SUM, MEMO_SUM, PASSPORT_SUM, PASSWORD_SUM, VEHICLENUMBER_SUM, ETC_SUM FROM TCKTDO WHERE TOTAL_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY PROGRESS_PERCENTAGE, TOT_OBJ_CNT
SELECT DISTINCT USERNAME FROM TCKDBU WHERE 1=1 AND DB_SID = #{dbName}

SELECT A.CHECK_YMD, A.CHECK_GUBN, A.DB_NAME, COUNT(A.CHECK_GUBN) AS CNT FROM TCKPER A WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM TCKPER_EX B WHERE A.DB_NAME = B.DB_NAME AND A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.CHECK_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(B.ENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') ) AND CHECK_YMD BETWEEN #{checkStartDate} AND #{checkEndDate} GROUP BY A.CHECK_YMD, A.CHECK_GUBN, A.DB_NAME ORDER BY A.CHECK_YMD ASC

SELECT SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6) AS CHECK_YM, DB_NAME AS DB_NAME, CHECK_GUBN AS CHECK_GUBN, COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM TCKPER WHERE SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATEADD(MM, -12, TO_DATE(#{checkEndDate}, 'YYYYMM')), '%Y%m') AND #{checkEndDate} AND ( (CHECK_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6), 'YYYYMM')), '%Y%m%d')) OR (CHECK_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(NOW()-1, '%Y%m') ) ) ) GROUP BY SUBSTR(CHECK_YMD, 0, 6), DB_NAME, CHECK_GUBN

SELECT * FROM TCKPER A WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM TCKPER_EX B WHERE A.DB_NAME = B.DB_NAME AND A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.CHECK_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(B.ENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') )
